settings.heading: Shop your fave frank green accessories
settings.row_content:
Looking to take your favourite frank green water bottle to the next level? Need a gift for the frank friend in your life that has everything? Our wide range of planet-friendly frank green water bottle accessories mean that whatever your story, you’ll always stay effortlessly hydrated (and in style)!

Who says practical is boring? Our accessories come in a range of colours to suit your mood (and your ‘fit). After an understated elegance? Try Midnight, Deep Ocean, Cloud, or Khaki. Want to stand out from the crowd with a splash of colour? Why not go for Neon Pink, Buttermilk, or Lilac Haze. Match your bottle or mix it up a little for your own unique combo!

Whether you want to protect your bottle from little bumps and dings, or easily pop your drink in your car cup holder, there’s a whole host of unique accessories here to level up your frank green bottle experience.

settings.heading: Which frank green bottles fit in cup holders?
settings.row_content:
Our 25oz / 740ml Original Reusable Bottle fits comfortably into standard cup holders, effortlessly joining you on every adventure. But if you’ve needed more  hydration with a larger 34oz / 1000ml companion.

We’ve got six fabulous colours to join you for the ride. Try pastels or sleek simplicity with Mint Gelato, Blush, Cloud, and Midnight, or our bright standouts Neon Pink, and Neon Orange. Match your cup holder to your car, or make it a focal point while you cruise down those highways in style!

settings.heading: What frank green accessories are available?
settings.row_content:
Whether you’re looking for a bottle add-on, or a sleek accessory to up your sustainability game, we have loads of stylish accessories to choose from:

  • Our trusty Bottle Bumper Guard is made from durable silicone to guard against life’s inevitable scratches and dings. Lost your bottle? That’s why we added a hidden slot for your Apple AirTag® or Tile®. Brilliant (we think so anyway)!
  • Our screw top Tea Infuser makes the perfect pairing with your frank green Push Button Lid cup or bottle. Why use a teapot when you can just fill it up, splash in some H2O, and head on down to flavour-town! Tea’s not your jam? The stainless steel mesh filter is also perfect for berries, herbs, and more, whatever your strain-game!
